caption.center: SUSAN L. SELLERS, Former Wife, Appellant, v. TIMOTHY M. SELLERS,

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, First District.

opinion.posture: An appeal from the Circuit Court for Okaloosa County. Thomas T. Remington, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:

opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED.
BENTON, C.J., ROBERTS, and RAY, JJ., CONCUR.
NOT FINAL UNTIL TIME EXPIRES TO FILE MOTION FOR REHEARING AND DISPOSITION THEREOF IF FILEDPage 1
